# MDEx

> The fastest Markdown parser for Elixir. Phoenix LiveView native, AI streaming support. Built on Rust (comrak, ammonia, autumnus).

MDEx transforms markdown into HTML, HEEx, JSON, XML, and more with native Phoenix LiveView integration. Significantly faster and more memory-efficient than pure Elixir alternatives.

## Key Features
- Blazingly fast (Rust-powered via comrak)
- Native Phoenix LiveView HEEx rendering via ~MD sigil
- AI streaming for incomplete markdown fragments
- 70+ languages syntax highlighting with 100+ themes (Tree-sitter powered)
- Multiple output formats: HTML, JSON, XML, Quill Delta, HEEx
- Floki-like AST with Req-like pipeline API
- Built-in XSS protection with ammonia

## Docs
- [Getting Started](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/readme.html): Installation and basic usage
- [Phoenix LiveView Integration](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/phoenix_live_view_heex.html): ~MD sigil and HEEx components
- [Syntax Highlighting](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/syntax_highlight.html): 70+ languages, 100+ themes
- [Document Manipulation](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/MDEx.Document.html): AST traversal and transformation
- [Streaming](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/MDEx.Document.html#module-streaming): AI application support
- [Plugins](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/plugins.html): Extending functionality
- [Safety](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/safety.html): XSS protection and sanitization
- [API Reference](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/MDEx.html): Complete API documentation

## Examples
- [Code Block Decorators](https://hexdocs.pm/mdex/code_block_decorators-2.html): Theme overrides and line highlighting

## Source
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/leandrocp/mdex): Source code and issues
- [Hex.pm Package](https://hex.pm/packages/mdex): Package downloads
- [Changelog](https://github.com/leandrocp/mdex/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md): Version history

## Related Projects
- [Autumnus](https://autumnus.dev): Syntax highlighting engine
- [comrak](https://github.com/kivikakk/comrak): Rust CommonMark parser
- [ammonia](https://github.com/rust-ammonia/ammonia): HTML sanitization

## Optional
- [Benchmark Script](https://github.com/leandrocp/mdex/blob/main/benchmark.exs): Performance benchmarks
